languages.text: {n}Кассия холодно пожимает плечами.{/n} "Мне довелось побеседовать с навигаторами Дома, используя Атлас. В последнее время я все явственней чувствую, как укрепляется наша связь. Ренегаты уничтожили еще несколько пустотных поместий, и стычки со смертельным исходом вспыхивают внутри Дома с незавидной частотой. Льется священная кровь Орселлио... Прискорбно. И неудивительно, учитывая вашу {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_KilledBothNavis}кровожадность на Эурак-V{/d} и сколь нещадно вы {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_AllExecuted}обезглавили сразу двух лидеров противоборствующих сторон{/d} во время официального приема на Даргонусе".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кассия холодно пожимает плечами.{/n} "Мне довелось побеседовать с Навигаторами Дома, используя Атлас. В последнее время я все явственней чувствую, как укрепляется наша связь. Ренегаты уничтожили еще несколько пустотных поместий, и стычки со смертельным исходом вспыхивают внутри Дома с незавидной частотой. Льется священная кровь Орселлио... Прискорбно. И неудивительно, учитывая вашу кровожадность на Эурак-V и сколь нещадно вы обезглавили сразу двух лидеров противоборствующих сторон во время официального приема на Даргонусе".

languages.text: {n}Cassia shrugs coldly.{/n} "I have spoken with the House's Navigators through the Atlas. These days, I can feel with increasing clarity how our connection is growing stronger. The renegades have destroyed several more void estates, and internal skirmishes with fatal consequences are occurring on an alarmingly regular basis. Sacred Orsellio blood is being spilt... That is utterly lamentable. But unsurprising, considering your {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_KilledBothNavis}fit of bloodlust on Eurac V{/d} and your merciless actions that {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_AllExecuted}left not one but two leaders of the feuding sides decapitated{/d} at the official reception on Dargonus."
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия холодно пожимает плечами.{/n} "Мне довелось побеседовать с навигаторами Дома, используя Атлас. В последнее время я все явственней чувствую, как укрепляется наша связь. Ренегаты уничтожили еще несколько пустотных поместий, и стычки со смертельным исходом вспыхивают внутри Дома с незавидной частотой. Льется священная кровь Орселлио... Прискорбно. И неудивительно, учитывая вашу {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_KilledBothNavis}кровожадность на Эурак-V{/d} и сколь нещадно вы {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_AllExecuted}обезглавили сразу двух лидеров противоборствующих сторон{/d} во время официального приема на Даргонусе".

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia shrugs coldly.{/n} "I have spoken with the House's Navigators through the Atlas. These days, I can feel with increasing clarity how our connection is growing stronger. The renegades have destroyed several more void estates, and internal skirmishes with fatal consequences are occurring terribly frequently. The sacred Orsellio blood is being spilled... Most lamentable. But unsurprising, considering your fit of bloodlust on Eurac V and your merciless actions that left not one, but two leaders of the feuding sides decapitated during the official reception on Dargonus."

{n}Cassia shrugs coldly.{/n} "I have spoken with the House's Navigators through the Atlas. These days, I can feel with increasing clarity how our connection is growing stronger. The renegades have destroyed several more void estates, and internal skirmishes with fatal consequences are occurring terribly frequently. The sacred Orsellio blood is being spilled... Most lamentable. But unsurprising, considering your fit of bloodlust on Eurac V and your merciless actions that left not one, but two leaders of the feuding sides decapitated during the official reception on Dargonus."

But unsurprising, considering your fit of bloodlust on Eurac V and your merciless actions that left not one but two leaders of the feuding sides decapitated at the official reception on Dargonus."

The renegades have destroyed several more void estates, and internal skirmishes with fatal consequences are occurring on an alarmingly regular basis. Sacred Orsellio blood is being spilt... That is utterly lamentable. But unsurprising, considering your {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_KilledBothNavis}fit of bloodlust on Eurac V{/d} and your merciless actions that {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_AllExecuted}left not one but two leaders of the feuding sides decapitated{/d} at the official reception on Dargonus."

languages.text: {n}カシアは冷ややかに肩をすくめる。{/n}「私はアトラスを通じて航宙士の家と話してきました。最近では、このつながりがますます強くなっているのを一層鮮明に感じます。反逆派はヴォイドの遺産をまた何点か破壊し、致命的な結果を招く内紛が驚くほど定期的に起きています。聖なるオーセリオの血が流されている…これは紛れもない悲劇です。しかしあなたがしてきた行いを思えば、当然でしょう。{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_KilledBothNavis}ユーラック・Vでは血に飢え{/d}、激しい行動をとり、ダルゴナスの公式歓迎会では揉め事を制裁するために無慈悲にも{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_AllExecuted}両陣営の首を落としましたね{/d}」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia shrugs coldly.{/n} "I have spoken with the House's Navigators through the Atlas. These days, I can feel with increasing clarity how our connection is growing stronger. The renegades have destroyed several more void estates, and internal skirmishes with fatal consequences are occurring on an alarmingly regular basis. Sacred Orsellio blood is being spilt... That is utterly lamentable. But unsurprising, considering your {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_KilledBothNavis}fit of bloodlust on Eurac V{/d} and your merciless actions that {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_AllExecuted}left not one but two leaders of the feuding sides decapitated{/d} at the official reception on Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアは冷ややかに肩をすくめる。{/n}「私はアトラスを通じて航宙士の家と話してきました。最近では、このつながりがますます強くなっているのを一層鮮明に感じます。反逆派はヴォイドの遺産をまた何点か破壊し、致命的な結果を招く内紛が驚くほど定期的に起きています。聖なるオーセリオの血が流されている…これは紛れもない悲劇です。しかしあなたがしてきた行いを思えば、当然でしょう。ユーラック・Vでは血に飢え、激しい行動をとり、ダルゴナスの公式歓迎会では揉め事を制裁するために無慈悲にも両陣営の首を落としましたね」

languages.text: {n}卡西娅冷漠地耸了耸肩。{/n}“我之前通过圣仪的力量，与家族内所有导航者进行了交流。这段时间以来，我越来越清楚地感觉到，我们之间的联系变得越来越紧密。不过，那些叛徒又摧毁了几座虚空星站，内部冲突偶尔也会造成伤亡。奥赛罗家族神圣的血脉就这样白白流淌……这实在是令人感到遗憾。不过，考虑到你在{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_KilledBothNavis}欧拉克五号星的嗜血行为{/d}，还有你在{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_AllExecuted}达戈努斯官方招待会上杀害了双方领袖{/d}的冷酷决定，这样的结果并不令人意外。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia shrugs coldly.{/n} "I have spoken with the House's Navigators through the Atlas. These days, I can feel with increasing clarity how our connection is growing stronger. The renegades have destroyed several more void estates, and internal skirmishes with fatal consequences are occurring on an alarmingly regular basis. Sacred Orsellio blood is being spilt... That is utterly lamentable. But unsurprising, considering your {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_KilledBothNavis}fit of bloodlust on Eurac V{/d} and your merciless actions that {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_AllExecuted}left not one but two leaders of the feuding sides decapitated{/d} at the official reception on Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅冷漠地耸了耸肩。{/n}“我之前通过圣仪的力量，与家族内所有导航者进行了交流。这段时间以来，我越来越清楚地感觉到，我们之间的联系变得越来越紧密。不过，那些叛徒又摧毁了几座虚空星站，内部冲突偶尔也会造成伤亡。奥塞罗家族神圣的血脉就这样白白流淌……这实在是令人感到遗憾。不过，考虑到你在欧拉克五号星的嗜血行为，还有你在达戈努斯官方招待会上杀害了双方领袖的冷酷决定，这样的结果并不令人意外。”

languages.text: {n}Cassia se contente de hausser les épaules avec indifférence.{/n} « J'ai pu parler aux navigateurs de ma maison via l'Atlas. Le lien qui nous unit ne cesse de se renforcer, dernièrement... Je le sens avec de plus en plus de clarté. Quoi qu'il en soit, les renégats ont détruit plusieurs autres domaines, et ce, malgré de nombreux conflits internes aux conséquences plus que dramatiques. Quand je pense à tout ce sang Orsellio sacré versé... C'est déplorable. Mais j'imagine qu'il fallait s'y attendre, après votre {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_KilledBothNavis}crise sanguinaire sur Eurac-V{/d} et cette bonne idée que vous avez eu de {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_AllExecuted}faire décapiter non pas un, mais deux leaders des sites rivaux{/d} lors de la réception officielle sur Dargonus. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia shrugs coldly.{/n} "I have spoken with the House's Navigators through the Atlas. These days, I can feel with increasing clarity how our connection is growing stronger. The renegades have destroyed several more void estates, and internal skirmishes with fatal consequences are occurring on an alarmingly regular basis. Sacred Orsellio blood is being spilt... That is utterly lamentable. But unsurprising, considering your {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_KilledBothNavis}fit of bloodlust on Eurac V{/d} and your merciless actions that {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_AllExecuted}left not one but two leaders of the feuding sides decapitated{/d} at the official reception on Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia se contente de hausser les épaules avec indifférence.{/n} « J'ai pu parler aux navigateurs de ma maison via l'Atlas. Le lien qui nous unit ne cesse de se renforcer, dernièrement... Je le sens avec de plus en plus de clarté. Quoi qu'il en soit, les renégats ont détruit plusieurs autres domaines, et ce, malgré de nombreux conflits internes aux conséquences plus que dramatiques. Quand je pense à tout ce sang Orsellio sacré versé... C'est déplorable. Mais j'imagine qu'il fallait s'y attendre, après votre crise sanguinaire sur Eurac-V et cette bonne idée que vous avez eu de faire décapiter non pas un, mais deux leaders des sites rivaux lors de la réception officielle sur Dargonus. »

languages.text: {n}Cassia se encoge de hombros con frialdad.{/n} «He hablado con los navegantes de la casa a través del Atlas. Percibo con una claridad cada vez mayor que nuestro vínculo se está fortaleciendo. Los renegados han destruido varias fincas más en el vacío, y cada vez es mayor el número de escaramuzas internas que se saldan con consecuencias fatales. Se está derramando la sagrada sangre de los Orsellio... Es algo lamentable. Aunque no es de extrañar, habida cuenta de su {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_KilledBothNavis}sanguinario arrebato en Eurac V{/d} y la crueldad de la que hizo gala, por la cual {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_AllExecuted}no ya uno, sino los dos líderes de los bandos en liza acabaron decapitados{/d} en la recepción oficial de Dargonus».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia shrugs coldly.{/n} "I have spoken with the House's Navigators through the Atlas. These days, I can feel with increasing clarity how our connection is growing stronger. The renegades have destroyed several more void estates, and internal skirmishes with fatal consequences are occurring on an alarmingly regular basis. Sacred Orsellio blood is being spilt... That is utterly lamentable. But unsurprising, considering your {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_KilledBothNavis}fit of bloodlust on Eurac V{/d} and your merciless actions that {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_AllExecuted}left not one but two leaders of the feuding sides decapitated{/d} at the official reception on Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia se encoge de hombros con frialdad.{/n} «He hablado con los navegantes de la casa a través del Atlas. Percibo con una claridad cada vez mayor que nuestro vínculo se está fortaleciendo. Los renegados han destruido varias fincas más en el vacío, y cada vez es mayor el número de escaramuzas internas que se saldan con consecuencias fatales. Se está derramando la sagrada sangre de los Orsellio... Es algo lamentable. Aunque no es de extrañar, habida cuenta de su sanguinario arrebato en Eurac V y la crueldad de la que hizo gala, por la cual no ya uno, sino los dos líderes de los bandos en liza acabaron decapitados en la recepción oficial de Dargonus».

languages.text: {n}Cassia zuckt kalt mit den Schultern.{/n} "Ich habe durch den Atlas mit den Navigatoren des Hauses gesprochen. Ich spüre mit immer größerer Klarheit, wie unsere Verbindung stärker wird. Die Abtrünnigen haben noch einige weitere Leereanwesen zerstört, und es kommt mit erschreckender Regelmäßigkeit zu internen Scharmützeln mit tödlichen Konsequenzen. Das heilige Blut der Orsellios wird vergossen ... Das ist extrem bedauerlich. Aber wenig überraschend, bedenkt man Euren Anfall der {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_KilledBothNavis}Blutrünstigkeit auf Eurac V{/d} und Euer gnadenloses Vorgehen, das beim offiziellen Empfang auf Dargonus {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_AllExecuted}nicht nur einen, sondern gleich zwei der Anführer der verfeindeten Seiten kopflos zurückgelassen hat{/d}."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia shrugs coldly.{/n} "I have spoken with the House's Navigators through the Atlas. These days, I can feel with increasing clarity how our connection is growing stronger. The renegades have destroyed several more void estates, and internal skirmishes with fatal consequences are occurring on an alarmingly regular basis. Sacred Orsellio blood is being spilt... That is utterly lamentable. But unsurprising, considering your {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_KilledBothNavis}fit of bloodlust on Eurac V{/d} and your merciless actions that {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_AllExecuted}left not one but two leaders of the feuding sides decapitated{/d} at the official reception on Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia zuckt kalt mit den Schultern.{/n} "Ich habe durch den Atlas mit den Navigatoren des Hauses gesprochen. Ich spüre mit immer größerer Klarheit, wie unsere Verbindung stärker wird. Die Abtrünnigen haben noch einige weitere Leereanwesen zerstört, und es kommt mit erschreckender Regelmäßigkeit zu internen Scharmützeln mit tödlichen Konsequenzen. Das heilige Blut der Orsellios wird vergossen ... Das ist extrem bedauerlich. Aber wenig überraschend, bedenkt man Euren Anfall der Blutrünstigkeit auf Eurac V und Euer gnadenloses Vorgehen, das beim offiziellen Empfang auf Dargonus nicht nur einen, sondern gleich zwei der Anführer der verfeindeten Seiten kopflos zurückgelassen hat."

languages.text: {n}Cassia, umursamazca omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Atlas üzerinden Hanemin Rotacılarıyla konuştum. Bağlantımızın güç kazandığını artık gittikçe daha da net bir şekilde hissedebiliyorum. Hainler, birkaç uçsuz konağını daha yok etti. Ayrıca ölümle sonuçlanan iç çatışmalar da endişelendirici bir şekilde düzenli aralıklarla yaşanıyor. Kutsal Orsellio kanı dökülüyor... Hâlimiz içler acısı. Gerçi {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_KilledBothNavis}Eurac V'teki kana susamışlığını{/d} ve de Dargonus'taki resmî merasimde aman vermeyişin yüzünden {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_AllExecuted}kavgalı taraflardan bir değil, iki liderin de kellesinin uçtuğunu{/d} düşününce bu duruma şaşmamak lazım."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia shrugs coldly.{/n} "I have spoken with the House's Navigators through the Atlas. These days, I can feel with increasing clarity how our connection is growing stronger. The renegades have destroyed several more void estates, and internal skirmishes with fatal consequences are occurring on an alarmingly regular basis. Sacred Orsellio blood is being spilt... That is utterly lamentable. But unsurprising, considering your {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_KilledBothNavis}fit of bloodlust on Eurac V{/d} and your merciless actions that {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_AllExecuted}left not one but two leaders of the feuding sides decapitated{/d} at the official reception on Dargonus."

Hainler, birkaç uçsuz konağını daha yok etti. Ayrıca ölümle sonuçlanan iç çatışmalar da endişelendirici bir şekilde düzenli aralıklarla yaşanıyor. Kutsal Orsellio kanı dökülüyor... Hâlimiz içler acısı. Gerçi {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_KilledBothNavis}Eurac V'teki kana susamışlığını{/d} ve de Dargonus'taki resmî merasimde aman vermeyişin yüzünden {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ1_AllExecuted}kavgalı taraflardan bir değil, iki liderin de kellesinin uçtuğunu{/d} düşününce bu duruma şaşmamak lazım."
